template.template: Template SNR Error and Discared Packets
template.name: Template SNR Error and Discared Packets

application.name: SNR Application Error and Discared Packets

discovery_rule.name: Network Interfaces Error and Discard Discovery

application.name: SNR Application Error and Discared Packets
SNR Application Error and Discared Packets
SNR Application Error and Discared Packets
SNR Application Error and Discared Packets

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNR Error and Discared Packets:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {Template SNR Error and Discared Packets:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}>{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template SNR Error and Discared Packets:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8 and {Template SNR Error and Discared Packets:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<{$IF_ERRORS_WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High error rate

item.host: Template SNR Error and Discared Packets
Template SNR Error and Discared Packets
Template SNR Error and Discared Packets
Template SNR Error and Discared Packets

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}<0 and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0 and ( {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=6 or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=7 or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=11 or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=62 or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=69 or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=117 ) and ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].change()}>0 and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].prev()}>0) or ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Ethernet has changed to lower speed than it was before

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High bandwidth usage >{$IF_UTIL_MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}%

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template SNR Interfaces Statistic:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
